title: Existing hutments in the slum pockets occupying lands in dangerous locations such as hill slopes, marshy lands, or in close proximity of water bodies, or lands abutting Railway tracks or sites immediately required for the public and semi-public projects may be relocated on other suitable locations with the prior approval of C
clause_text: Existing hutments in the slum pockets occupying lands in dangerous locations such as hill slopes, marshy lands, or in close proximity of water bodies, or lands abutting Railway tracks or sites immediately required for the public and semi-public projects may be relocated on other suitable locations with the prior approval of C.E.O., S.R.A.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
